body:
Could we add a more appropriate march when using llvm 11 on a a64fx system?  Assume change to 

`lib/spack/llnl/util/cpu/microarchitectures.json`

And add under clang compiler for `a64fx`
```
{
            "versions": "11:",
            "flags": "-march=a64fx"
}
```
title: Add march=a64fx when using llvm 11
